channel.title: Help me please!
channel.description: Does anyone know how to add more then 12 players becuse the max i can go on my pk server is only 12 please do anyone know how to make it so more players can come in?? thanks :) im using pimpscape source i give you a rep :)

item.title: Help me please!
item.dc:creator: @aber aber
item.description:
@aber wrote:

.[br][size=1]Posted at: November 16, 2006, 11:42:39 PM[/size][hr] if(PlayerHandler.playerCount >= PlayerHandler.maxPlayers) {
returnCode = 7;
savefile = false;
disconnected = true;
System.out.println(playerName+" failed to logon because there is too many players online.");
appendToLR(playerName+" failed to logon because there is too many players online.");
}
